messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
no

no
Please let me know when you're ready.
okay
Can you introduce yourself?
You are the candidate. Tell mw your details.
This may carry a negative impression in the evaluation.
Thank you for the opportunity
Same here, now please continue with the previous question -  Can you introduce yourself?
Let's skip to the next question.
You are not allowed to skip this question.
My name is Yashraj Mehta.
Could you elaborate more on this?
I like playing golf.
Please stay focused on the interview.
No way I am elaborating anymore.

As I didn't find any suitable response, moving on to the next question. I could not find any project or experience in your resume. I can see that you've mentioned HTML as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
